message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $10,000. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $11,000?
I understand your position, Bob.  While I value this product highly, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise for both of us.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $12,500. This still allows me to stay within my financial limits while acknowledging the product's worth.
